description: Pear and goats cheese is a classic salad combination, made more filling and nutritious with garlic lentils.
name: Roasted Pear, Lentil & Goats Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g pears, cored and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C, place the pears in a baking tray surrounded by red onion wedges, drizzle with half of the oil and red wine vinegar and toss to coat. Roast for 25 minutes, turning halfway through.
Add the rest of the oil to a pan on medium high heat and cook the garlic for 2 minutes, stir in the lentils and cook until warmed through. Tip the pears, onions and pan juices and cook for 1 minute.
Remove from the heat, stir through the rocket and serve with crumbled goats cheese and a drizzle of honey on top.
